modName: Total Tundra Texture Transplant (Green Whiterun Tundra)
summary: Makes the Whiterun tundra green and mossy. Very lightweight and performance friendly. In fact, there should be no performance impact at all.
descriptionHtml:
[i]Makes the tundra more green-ish. See screenshots. I made it for myself since I prefer this look, maybe someone else will like it as well.[/i]
[b]Feel free to add some screenshots of what it looks like on your setup. My computer is too shit to run any fancy graphic mods.

SUMMARY[/b]
[b]________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[/b]
[b]---> [/b]Simple texture replacer. Switches out the orange-y tundra textures with mossier green-ish reach textures.

[b]--->[/b] Reuses vanilla textures, which means pretty much 0 impact on FPS. I haven't noticed any difference on my shitty laptop at least.

[b]--->[/b] Mod only contains textures and nothing else. You can uninstall it without problems, in case you decide you don't like it.


[b]
TWO VERSIONS - Just install one[/b]
[b]________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/b]

[b]1. BASIC: [/b]Normal/Standard version. Textures are a bit more varied in this.
[b]2. MORE MOSS:[/b] Uses the reach moss texture more extensively. It's greener/more uniform. But less varied, more same-y.

Performance wise no difference. 

[b]

Extra
[/b][b]________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

[/b]
->I haven't edited the lods in my mod. Which means far away the tundra will still have it's original colors (not green). I use the mod "Green Lods"  to fix that.

[b]Green Lods [/b]
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60215


->If you want green grass inside Whiterun:

[b]Green Grass inside Whiterun:[/b]
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7522/?tab=files


->In case you want thicc grass for your green tundra:

[b]Voluptuous Grasses-The T H I C C K E N I N G[/b]
https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90945?tab=description


[b]________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________[/b]
[i]You could also check out Imaginator or Immersive Saturation. I used them in some of the screenshots. Vanilla colours feel a bit too washed out imo.

[/i]Special Edition-Edition: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/18944/?tab=description]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/18944/?tab=description[/url]
author: Surjamte
